str2: And he, she, it, and that. From kai and ekeinos; likewise that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From apo and erchomai; to go off, aside or behind, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To report (from one place to another), bring a report, announce, declare. From apo and the base of aggelos; to announce.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others. Masculine plural of a derivative of leipo; remaining ones.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.
